ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] fear kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya Ninev!  Didn t know you were on the list , glad to hear from you! I haven t noticed resists in Kunark being unusually high, except for Iksars. They are
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya Ninev! Didn't know you were on the 'list', glad to hear from you!

I haven't noticed resists in Kunark being unusually high, except for Iksars.
They are apparently immune to charm and resist a lot better than similar
level mobs. In addition they are smart enough to ignore your 'pet' while
charming.

Tried to do fear/chains a bit in FM last night since its not something I
consider myself proficient at. Learned that there are way too many
wanderers there to do it effectively. Did figure that if I was unmolested I
could beat a Sarnak Dragoon that just became blue to me, but I'd take
several bubs of damage due to resists.

Burynai btw seem to be magic resistance deficient. I had to charm a yellow
Digmaster when it got involved in my Dragoon fight. It never resisted on
about 30 charms. Of course I had to flee from it after it killed the
Dragoon anyhow since it took about a sliver of counterattack damage from the
Dragoon.

Kitasi Faegehearper of E'ci
A bard on the first plane of Hell

Ninev Rudefulte
32nd Chorus of Karana
E'Ci
